r.s: Provides an easy way to perform HTTP requests
r.d: Supports GET/POST/HEAD/TRACE/PUT/DELETE, Basic authentication, Proxy, Proxy Authentication, SSL, file uploads etc.
r.n: Bug fixes: * Fixed #1037 (unable to connect to port 80 through HTTPS). This relies on fix for Net_URL bug #1036, thus Net_URL 1.0.12 is now required. * Fixed #1333 (sending POST data on non-POST requests). * Fixed #1433 (overwriting the variable name when adding multiple files for upload).
